mention.text: the largest oil spill in U.S. history , which spewed from a ship that ran aground trying to avoid chunks of ice
the largest oil spill in U.S. history
U.S. history , which spewed from a ship that ran aground trying to avoid chunks of ice
a ship that ran aground trying to avoid chunks of ice
Valdez , the northermost ice-free port in the United States
Valdez , a town of about 3,000 year-round residents that grows to more than 4,000 with a summer influx of fishing industry workers and travelers
the heavy North Slope crude oil
Golob , a Cambridge , Mass.-based consultant whose firm has studied oil spills and environmental disasters for 15 years
a Cambridge , Mass.-based consultant whose firm has studied oil spills and environmental disasters for 15 years
an engineer for the state Department of Environmental Conservation
the Alyeska Pipeline Service Co. marine terminal
environmentalists sensitive about the trans-Alaska pipeline and efforts to open the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge to oil development
the Dec. 15 , 1976 , grounding of the Argo Merchant tanker
